column4: HI, I'm a Linux-ubuntu newbie and I need some help connecting to a windows 2000 system and to a network printer on my home network.
I have installed samba but still having problems
specifically...?
what would you like to know
just what you mean by 'still having problems'
not printing
the printer is added but when I do a test page nothing comes out. The job appears in the print queue
you mean it appears on the 2k machine's print queue?
the printer is added and I'm able to go into properties and print a test page but nothing comes out
uhm, so really this is a windows problem.
I kinda doubt it since the printer works fine in windows on my network
i'll ask again: does the test page show up on the 2k machine's print queue, or the ubuntu one?
the system I'm on right now using linux is a dual booted system with XP and ubuntu. The printer works fine when printing from XP
that is not what i am talking about.  i'm asking this: when you print the test page from ubuntu, does it show up on the 2k machine's print queue?
I know it shows up on ubuntu, I'll go look and see if it appears on the win2000 system
yes, please.  that is what i have been asking all along.
their are no documents showing up in the print queue on the windows 2000 system
is this what you are doing: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WindowsXPPrinter
let me go check
essentially yes. I will follow the instructions and will get back to you in a minute
okay, good; and make sure to try disabling bidirectional support
ok I did as instructed and still no go
any more ideas on how to get my printer to work?
